attributes.action:
NHS Day 
July 5th to be a Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: To honour the NHS and its work since it's creation.  To enable everyone in Great Britain to use the day to create awareness and have it as fund raising day and for us as a nation to say Thank You for being there.
attributes.background: To declare 5th July as a Public Holiday for Great Britain. To enable funds to be raised and celebrate the day when the NHS was created.
